thread.title: Cate Blanchett in the Statement Bomber Jacket in New York City
thread.title_full: Cate Blanchett in the Statement Bomber Jacket in New York City

title: Cate Blanchett in the Statement Bomber Jacket in New York City
text: Cate Blanchett’s Furry Varsity Jacket Is Way Too Cool for School February 22, 2017 9:18 PM by Edward Barsamian Photo: Splash News Earlier today, we pronounced Kate Moss’s latest statement coat—a polished piece with hints of cheetah print —the ideal piece for day or nighttime dressing, but it appears that Moss may have some competition on this side of the Atlantic. Spotted out in the urban jungle of New York City today, the actress Cate Blanchett pulled a piece straight out of the model’s playbook by sporting a fur bomber jacket. This is a departure for the Academy Award–winner who often favors slick suiting or frothy and flirty dresses . But today’s look ushered in a new direction for the actress focused on a high-low aesthetic with haute accents. Blanchett’s shaggy lynx-inspired printed bodice was offset like a traditional baseball jacket with contrasting sleeves. This was a wise styling trick as Blanchett let her coat do the talking, keeping the rest of her look simple. As for accessories, Blanchett wore rose-adorned kicks, a classic hobo, and oversize shades. No doubt la Moss would approve. In This Story: Cate Blanchett Recommended For You
